description:
Version = Essex (2012.1.1-15.el6)
This issue is relavent to: Nova, Glance, Keystone

Looking at: 

/etc/logrotate.d/openstack-nova

compress

/var/log/nova/*.log {
    weekly
    rotate 4
    missingok
    compress
    minsize 100k
}

It's missing the 'size' param (limit of max file size) and the copytruncate which is an important param as well.

same goes to:

/etc/logrotate.d/openstack-glance
/etc/logrotate.d/openstack-keystone
title: Log Rotation missing size and copytruncate params.
